sentences.en: a plastic spoon
sentences.cn: 塑料汤匙

sentences.en: children’s toys made of plastic
sentences.cn: 塑料儿童玩具

sentences.en: Clay is a plastic substance.
sentences.cn: 黏土是可塑物质。

sentences.en: Councillors say plastic-framed windows lower the tone of the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 市政会委员说塑料框架的窗户让这个社区掉份儿了。

sentences.en: Cover with plastic film and refrigerate for 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 覆上保鲜膜，冷藏24小时。

sentences.en: He had plastic surgery to help reconstruct his badly damaged face.
sentences.cn: 他做了整形手术以修复其严重受伤的面部。

sentences.en: He has been left hideously disfigured by plastic surgery.
sentences.cn: 整形外科手术导致他完全毁容了。

sentences.en: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.cn: 他把塑料袋的两头系在了一起。

sentences.en: Holidaymakers should beware of using plastic cards in foreign cash dispensers.
sentences.cn: 外出度假时，在外币取款机上使用银行卡一定要小心。

sentences.en: plastic bags
sentences.cn: 塑料袋

sentences.en: Several blue plastic boxes under the window were filled with record albums.
sentences.cn: 窗下的几个蓝色塑料盒里装满了唱片。

sentences.en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentences.cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentences.en: The breeze grew in strength, the flags shook, plastic bunting creaked.
sentences.cn: 微风渐强，旗帜舞动起来，塑料彩纸吱吱作响。

sentences.en: The durable high-impact plastic case is water resistant to 100 feet.
sentences.cn: 这种结实的高强度塑料盒子在水下100英尺以内是防水的。

sentences.en: The mud is smooth, gray, soft, and plastic as butter.
sentences.cn: 这种泥浆呈灰色，它光滑、柔软，像黄油一样易塑。

sentences.en: The plastic-covered seat has a few small splits around the corners.
sentences.cn: 塑料面椅子的四角上有几道小裂缝。

sentences.en: the plastics industry
sentences.cn: 塑料工业

sentences.en: They put plastic sheeting on the insides of our windows.
sentences.cn: 他们在我们的窗子里面贴了层塑料薄膜。

sentences.en: Using plastic to pay for an order is simplicity itself.
sentences.cn: 用信用卡支付订单是很简单的事。

sentences.en: Waterproofed fabric pants are more expensive than plastic pants.
sentences.cn: 防水纤维短裤比塑料短裤贵多了。

words.tran_cn: 塑性，可塑性；适应性；柔软性
[塑料]塑料制品；整形；[力]可塑体

phrases.tran_cn: 塑性流动；塑性流；范性流变；粘（滞）流（动）
塑料片材；薄片；塑料薄膜

trans.tran_cn: 塑料的，不自然的，可塑的，做作的

trans.tran_en: a light strong material that is produced by a chemical process, and which can be made into different shapes when it is soft
